## Sector Analysis

```{r} 
#| echo: true
library(tidyquant)
library(ggplot2)
library(dplyr)

tickers <- c("CLX", "CL", "PG", "CHD", "KMB")

prices <- tq_get(tickers,
               from = "2024-01-01",
               to = "2025-02-01",
               get = "stock.prices")

prices |>
  ggplot(aes(x = date, y = adjusted, color = symbol)) +
  geom_line() +
  labs(subtitle = "Simple stock price comparison for the last year against major competitors")
```
